summary: Be a turtle with the Ninja turle race or join the others, or both if you want! Defeat the Foot-clan, Kill Shredder and a various amount of other enemies
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=7][font=Arial]TMNT MOD v9 (v10 soon)[/font][/size]


[size=7][font=Arial]BY [color=#3366cc]TITAN/OPYS[/color][/font][/size]


[b][url=http://www.youtube.com/user/OpysMagic][size=5]Check out my channel for videos of, the mod! [/size][/url]
[/b]



Featured on Gamespot





[quote][size=4][font=Arial]NEW UPDATE COMMING SOOON![/font][/size][/quote]






[youtube]zwFgc7tOu3o[/youtube][/center]

[center][color=#ff3333][size=7][i][b]MY OTHER MODS[/b][/i][/size][/color][/center]

[center][youtube]t90B6snDclw[/youtube][/center]

[center][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52758/?][i][b][color=#cc3333]FULLY VOICED SPIDERMAN[/color][/b][/i][/url][/size]

[youtube]ybXkRUMK2YQ[/youtube][/center]

[center][color=#333333][i][color=#333333][size=5][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50499/?][b]DARTH VADER ARMOR[/b][/url][/size][/color][/i][/color][/center]


[center][color=#333333][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50499/?][/url][size=5][i][youtube]W5DexV-Y-js[/youtube]
[/i][/size][/color][/center]
[center][size=5][i][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W5DexV-Y-js][color=#ff3333][b]THE WALKING DEAD[/b][/color][/url]
[/i][/size]


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[size=6]Mod Review by Andaley[/size]









[youtube]TeNcpRGTW6I[/youtube]




[size=6][font=Arial]Live your life as a [color=#336633]turtle[/color]! fight the foot! kill [color=#ff6633]Shredder[/color] and his [color=#ffcc33]associations[/color], with or without your turtle friends (DUAL WIELDING FIXED IN V09!)[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial][img=1280x720]https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/modsweg/2013-11-25_00025.jpg?w=AAC1BthCMSpXHEM5SL-i9OzVmPn8dNoOC7kb0iOdoJg1TQ[/img][/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]All the [color=#336633]turtles[/color] are located in the Ragged flagon in Riften (Thieves Guild)[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]If they are not wearing their armor, simply give them some. Either by cheating or creating it at the forge.[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Arial]The mod also includes a few weapons you can use for the [color=#336633]turtles[/color] weapons. If you choose to be a [color=#336633]turtle[/color] yourself the v07 update includes new fightmoves and higher jumpes by[color=#7c7c7c] EvanoOblivion.[/color][/font][/size]



[size=4][font=Arial][img=1280x720]https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/modsweg/2013-11-25_00016.jpg?w=AAB72ysJ7c1chA4Six_06aOSRxLjC7FoNT1mBSW_0f7xqw[/img][/font][/size][/sup]
[sup][size=4][font=Arial]The [color=#ff3333]Foot[/color] is taking over Skyrim![/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]and you and the [color=#336633]turtles[/color] must stop them![/font][/size][/sup][size=4]


[size=4][font=Arial]List:[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Riften[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Whiterun[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Windhelm[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Arial]Winterhold[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]And in the wilderness[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]But don't worry you also have some [color=#3366ff]friends[/color]! [/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]List:[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Arial]Casey[/font][/size]




[size=4][font=Arial]April[/font][/size]



[size=4][font=Arial]Spiderman[/font][/size]




[size=4][font=Arial]Casey is in Whiterun![/font][/size]






[size=4][font=Arial]April has been captured by Bebob and Rocksteady (Read further to know where they are)[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Spiderman... well[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial][img=800x800]https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/modsweg/2013-11-25_00012.jpg?w=AACJ2e-QSTpJhvpYuWdGilhdtrXIKNpGniJJL-9Z2yPEyg[/img][/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial][color=#ff3333]Shredder[/color] has hired some of his "[color=#ffcc33]friends[/color]" to take care of you and the turtles![/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]List:[/font][/size]




[size=4][font=Arial]Hun[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Baxter[/font][/size]



[size=4][font=Arial]Bebob and Rocksteady[/font][/size]


[/size]
[hr]
[size=4]
[size=4][font=Arial]Hun is outside the Dawnstar Sanctuary[/font][/size]


[size=4][font=Arial]Baxter is inside the Bleak Falls Temple[/font][/size]

[size=4][font=Arial]Bebob and Rocksteady are destroying Riften![/font][/size]


[/size]
[hr]
[size=4]


[size=4][font=Arial][color=#ff3333]Shredder[/color] is INSIDE Silus house in Dawnstar, so i suggest you finish his quest before installing the mod :)¨[/font][/size]






[size=4][font=Arial]He is tough, so try not to die :)[/font][/size]



[color=#76923c]COWABUNGA!![/color]

[img=1280x720]https://dl-web.dropbox.com/get/modsweg/2013-11-25_00020.jpg?w=AABYtSZma4-C9YCK1YtW3PUU2pkHGGyiYl50M2YLEEveLg[/img]

[/size][/center]
author: Titan

New fight moves
